person.persName: Minor Ellis (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and pvt 10th KY Cav USA)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Bath County native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Eden Ellis in Bath County on April 1, 1857. Father of Mary Ellis, Nancy Ellis, and John Ellis. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Served in the 10th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 8, 1862, to September 17, 1863. Prisoner of war, captured at Mt. Sterling, Kentucky, on March 22, 1863. Paroled at Camp Dennison, Ohio, on May 11, 1863.
